advisories.impact: Multiple issues in apache
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating apache to version 2.4.53.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Jeremy Brown working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Qi Sun of Trend Micro, Ye Zhang (@co0py_Cat) of Baidu Security

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Qi Sun and Robert Ai of Trend Micro

advisories.impact: A malicious application may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks to prevent unauthorized actions.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds access issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue existed that led to the disclosure of kernel memory. This was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Liu Long of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions on third-party applications.
